posts.content: Today we learned about patience from the story of Prophet Ayyub (AS). Such beautiful lessons for our children! 🤲
posts.ayahText: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, 'Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the most merciful of the merciful.'

posts.content: Learned a new dua today! الحمد لله رب العالمين 📿
posts.ayahText: Praise be to Allah, Lord of all the worlds

posts.content: SubhanAllah! The Arabic lesson today was amazing. I can now read simple words! 📖✨
